text: John Joseph Patrick Ryan (December 30, 1920 â€“ January 21, 1998), best known by his stage name, Jack Lord, was an American actor, director and producer. He was known for his starring role as Steve McGarrett in the CBS television program Hawaii Five-O, which ran from 1968 to 1980. Lord suffered from Alzheimer's disease for at least seven years before his death.
